roleset.name: Full of gas, farts

role.descr: Flatulent entity, farty person you want to avoid
Explicit mention of gas, usually metaphorical when used

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in Thyme. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Thyme usage
example.text: He became more flatulent but did not have any obvious changes in stool caliber .

example.name: Metaphorical usage, with arg2
example.text: The guy is flatulent with overpriced gas!

example.name: With Cause, arg0
example.note: The "with" arguments may be difficult to distinguish in some cases, but in most I hope that we can rely on the assumption that no one actually farts spinach, or any other substance that is ingested, causing flatulence.
